definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: Can two languages co-exist in a stable fashion over a long period of time?
sentences.chinese: 是兩種語言能夠以一種穩定的趨勢長期共存？

sentences.english: That is the culture compatible with long-term survival of civilisations .
sentences.chinese: 這個文化與文明的長期共存相容。

sentences.english: But it's necessary for the two countries to pursue long-term co-existence.
sentences.chinese: 中美兩國會有不同的觀點，但我們必須長期共存。
